summary.span: 產生具有指定之已產生程式碼片段的暫時程式碼檔。

span.span: Generates a temporary code file with the specified generated code fragment.

span.span: Creates a temporary code file with the specified generated code fragment.

summary.span: 取得或設定要寫入的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes to write.

value.span: 其值是完整類型名稱屬性的項目。

span.span: An item whose value is the full type name of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個中繼資料是參數，而必須是類型為 System.String 的名稱 / 值組。Each piece of metadata is the name-value pair of a parameter, which must be of type System.String. 有些屬性只允許位置建構函式引數，或使用者可能只想它們。Some attributes only allow positional constructor arguments, or the user may just prefer them. 若要設定的使用 中繼資料的名稱，例如 「 _Parameter1"，"_Parameter2 」 等。如果略過參數索引，則它會是錯誤。To set those, use metadata names like "_Parameter1", "_Parameter2" etc. If a parameter index is skipped, it's an error.

Public Overrides Function Execute () As Boolean

returns.span: 若已寫入程式碼片段，即為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the code fragment was written; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定要產生的程式碼語言。

span.span: Gets or sets the language of code to generate.

value.span: 若要產生的程式碼的語言。

span.span: The language of code to generate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語言名稱可以是 CodeDom 提供者是可以使用任何語言。Language name can be any language for which a CodeDom provider is available. 例如，"C#"、"VisualBasic"。For example, "C#", "VisualBasic". 針對該語言提供的預設延伸模組發出的檔案。The file emitted is given the default extension for that language.

summary.span: 取得或設定已產生程式碼的目的資料夾 (一般是中繼資料夾)。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination folder for the generated code, typically the intermediate folder.

value.span: 產生的程式碼的目的地資料夾。

span.span: The destination folder for the generated code.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定已產生之檔案的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the file that was generated.
The path to the file that was generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定此屬性與檔案名稱，會加上前頭的目的地資料夾。If setting this property with a file name, the destination folder will be prepended. 如果設定此屬性，其根目錄的值，將會忽略目的地資料夾。If setting this property with a rooted value, the destination folder will be ignored. 如果未設定這個屬性，WriteCodeFragment，則會使用目的地資料夾、 任意檔案名稱和預設的延伸模組的所選取的語言。If this property is not set, WriteCodeFragment uses the destination folder, an arbitrary file name, and the default extension for the language selected.
